name: Hop Hop, Mr. Frog!
description:
Hop your way around 5 hand-drawn worlds as Mr. Frog! As usual, the game is challenging. Might be frustrating for some players, but that's the point. I hope you understand & enjoy the difficulty.

Oh? Why is he hopping? ... Well, he's a frog. That is kind of what they do.

- Buy & Stream the Soundtrack Here! -
